short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TwitchHover adds a hover modal to the stock navigation to better the streaming experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't click into streams blindly.
Click with confidence!

TwitchHover is a tool to enhance the daily twitch viewers browsing experience by replacing the default Twitch navigation hover modal with a new, improved version.

Features:
- View a preview of your favorite streamer before you click into their stream
- Light and Dark mode
- Fun UI!
